Context:
To contact the Sexual Violence Response Advisor at George Brown College, you can reach them by phone at 416-415-5000 ext. 3450 or email svra@georgebrown.ca. For all communications related to Diversity, Equity and Human Rights Services, please use your official George Brown College email address. The phone number for other inquiries is 416-415-2000 with a TTY line available at 1-877-515-5559. The email address for general inquiries is ask.george@georgebrown.ca. For more information, you can visit the college's Social Media Hub.

Contact Information:
- Sexual Violence Response Advisor: 416-415-5000 ext. 3450, svra@georgebrown.ca
- General Inquiries: 416-415-2000, ask.george@georgebrown.ca
- TTY Line: 1-877-515-5559

Email addresses:
